channel.title: CVE Feed for aimeos -- ai-controller-frontend
channel.description: The latest CVEs for aimeos -- ai-controller-frontend

item.title: CVE-2024-39325|2024-07-02T20:36:58.336Z -- aimeos -- ai-controller-frontend
item.description: aimeos/ai-controller-frontend is the Aimeos frontend controller. Prior to versions 2024.04.2, 2023.10.9, 2022.10.8, 2021.10.8, and 2020.10.15, aimeos/ai-controller-frontend doesn't reset the payment status of a user's basket after the user completes a purchase. Versions 2024.04.2, 2023.10.9, 2022.10.8, 2021.10.8, and 2020.10.15 fix this issue.
